name: All Terrain Auto Care
address: 2335 Piney Grove Church Rd, Knoxville, TN 37909
summary: Started as a Jeep-only shop in 2000. Now services all makes but maintains a strong Jeep and Cherokee focus with factory-trained techs.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Jeep specialist shop in Knoxville that services Jeep models including Cherokee and Wrangler. Good fit for older Cherokee owners who want a shop that is used to Jeep platforms.

name: Just Jeeps
summary: Austin's original Jeep-only repair facility. In business 21+ years. Specializes in Cherokee, Grand Cherokee, Wrangler, and Comanche.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Jeep-only repair shop in Austin. Good option if you want a place that works on Jeeps every day instead of all-makes shops.

name: Banker Automotive
summary: General repair shop in South Austin. Not a Jeep specialist but personally used by the site owner for their 1996 Jeep Cherokee with good results.
jeep_friendly_blurb: General repair shop in Austin used by the site owner for their 1996 Jeep Cherokee. Not a Jeep specialist, but work quality was solid.

name: Suncoast Auto Repair Inc
summary: Full-service repair shop in Bradenton serving Jeep owners since 2003. Covers Wrangler, Cherokee, Grand Cherokee, and more.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Bradenton shop that advertises Jeep service and repair. Good general repair option for Cherokee owners who want a shop comfortable working on Jeep systems.

name: Harvey's Autotech
summary: Independent shop in Corona repairing Jeeps since 1991. Owner calls out Jeep enthusiasm on the site.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Corona shop that calls out Jeep repair and claims Jeep enthusiasm. Good for Cherokee owners who want a shop that openly welcomes Jeep work.

name: Garrigan's Auto Repair
address: 6465 East Golf Links Road, Tucson, AZ 85730
summary: Full-service Tucson shop with two locations. Servicing Jeeps since 2000 with modern inspection reporting.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Tucson full-service shop that explicitly advertises Jeep repairs. Good for basic Cherokee maintenance and repair with modern inspection reporting.

name: Fort Collins 4x4
address: 6024 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO 80525
summary: ASE-certified 4x4 specialists and NAPA AutoCare Center in Fort Collins. Services all Jeep generations including XJ.
jeep_friendly_blurb: 4x4-oriented shop that explicitly includes Jeeps in their service focus. Good for Cherokee owners doing lifts, suspension, lighting, and off-road upgrades.

name: The Organic Mechanic
summary: Family-owned Asheville shop with certified Jeep mechanics on staff. Services Cherokee, Wrangler, and all Jeep models.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Asheville shop that calls out Jeep-specific service. Good for Cherokee owners who want a shop that clearly advertises Jeep competence rather than a generic all-makes shop.

name: Snellville Auto Center
summary: Family-owned Snellville shop serving Jeep owners since 1987. Straightforward repair and maintenance in the Atlanta metro area.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Snellville shop that specifically advertises Jeep repairs. Good general repair option for Cherokee owners in the Atlanta metro area.

name: Davis AutoSports
address: 104 Roxbury Industrial Center, Charles City, VA 23030
summary: Nation's leading Cherokee XJ builder and seller with 300+ custom XJs built. Also handles builds, restoration, and used XJ sales.
jeep_friendly_blurb: XJ-focused build and restoration shop. Best fit for Cherokee owners who want higher-end XJ work, builds, and restoration-style services.

name: The Garage in Renton
address: 4233 N.E. Sunset Blvd, Ste. 5, Renton, WA 98059
summary: Renton shop with technicians who call themselves Jeep enthusiasts. Explicitly lists Cherokee among serviced Jeep models.
jeep_friendly_blurb: Renton shop that openly services Jeep models including Cherokee. Good for Cherokee owners who want a normal repair shop that still calls out Jeep service directly.

name: High Country 4x4 & Offroad
summary: 4x4 and suspension specialists. Lifts, axle rebuilds, and Cherokee-specific work. Call ahead for Cherokee appointments.

name: Cherokee Country Repair
summary: General Cherokee and Jeep repair. Known for accurate diagnostics on the 4.0L. Locally owned.

name: South TX Offroad Works
summary: Lifts, axle swaps, and driveline work on XJs and ZJs. Shop rate competitive. Work backs up fast so book early.

name: Pacific Trail Garage
summary: Full-service shop with a focus on older 4x4s. Familiar with XJ quirks. Honest diagnostics before any work starts.

name: Blue Ridge Jeep & 4x4
summary: XJ and ZJ specialists. Full general repair plus overheating and cooling system fixes. Reasonable rates.

name: Coastal Cherokee Clinic
summary: Good general shop that handles Cherokee electrical issues well. Clean work and fair pricing.

name: Sun State Cherokee Shop
summary: Cooling system and electrical specialists. Familiar with the overheating problems common on Florida-heat Cherokees.

name: Desert Iron 4x4
summary: Lift installs, axle work, and general XJ repairs. Owner has run Cherokees for 20+ years.

name: Peach State Jeep Works
summary: Honest general shop that handles Cherokee driveline and diagnostics. Long wait times but solid work.

name: Appalachian Offroad & Repair
summary: Full 4x4 repair shop with Cherokee experience. Lift installs, steering, and general service.

name: Northern Cal Cherokee Works
summary: General repair with solid electrical troubleshooting. Has Cherokee-specific diagnostic experience.

name: Rocky Mountain Salvage
summary: Large inventory of XJ and ZJ parts. Call ahead to check Cherokee availability before making the trip.

name: Southern Pull-A-Part
summary: Self-service yard with rotating Cherokee inventory. Bring your own tools. Low prices on pulled parts.

name: Texas Auto Recyclers
summary: Full-service salvage with a large inventory. Cherokee parts available. Shipping options on major components.

name: Pacific Northwest Jeep Salvage
summary: XJ and ZJ specialist salvage. Good rust-free inventory due to dry storage. Call before visiting.

name: Volunteer State Auto Parts
summary: Pull-a-part and full-service options. Regular Cherokee turnover. Check inventory online before the drive.

name: Desert Southwest Salvage
summary: Dry climate means rust-free parts. Strong Cherokee XJ inventory. Open most weekends.

name: Cherokee Parts Direct
summary: Online and local Cherokee-specific parts supplier. New and used XJ components. Ships nationwide.

name: Four Wheel Drive Hardware
summary: Mail-order and online parts retailer specializing in Jeep parts including XJ and ZJ components.
